attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition against Codex Alimentarius.

It's seriously going to take away our own freedom of health.

rejection.details:
A similar petition that closed on Saturday received 61,000 signatures. Please check back for the PM's response in the coming months. Any subsequent petitions on this topic are likely to receive the same response. However if you would still like to submit your petition we will accept it.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Vitamins/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
